task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, scan_action = #{scanAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, license_number = #{licenseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user_code = #{updateUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_site_code = #{endSiteCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, end_site_name = #{endSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_site_name = #{createSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update load_scan_record set force_status = 1 where yn = 1 and task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and waybill_code = #{wayBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update load_scan_record set yn=0 where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and yn = 1
